attributes.title: Need a cat sweater?
attributes.review: I downloaded this app about a month ago. At first I noted the awful graphics, design, and content, but that was before things got weird. The app updated but would not reinstall. For weeks it was â€œloading.â€ I could not access it or remove it from my phone. Less than 24 hours after the app shut down I began receiving amazon packages that were ordered from my account. Although I hadnâ€™t ordered anything besides a hat with grapefruits on it for a while, boxes upon boxes arrived at my doorstep all filled with MAGA cat sweaters. I do not even have a cat. It got worse. As the days went on, my lock screen was replace with moronic Trump quotes and the photos of me in my photo library suddenly appeared like I was head to toe in MAGA merchandise. Even my dog was wearing one of those awful cat sweaters. I am very uncomfortable with the havoc that this app has caused over the past few weeks. I do not know how to solve this issue, but I can assure I havenâ€™t had any trouble like this with Democratic campaign apps. If anyone needs a cat sweater I would be happy to ship it to you.
